post.text: We are going to change our immigration system to reflect American values! -DJT

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: American values? Okay. Take a good long look at Ellis Island. Time to open her for business

replies.author: Brennen
replies.text: Why do you want to move immigrant medical checks from overseas to the USA? Don't trust foreign doctors?

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: I have no idea what you're talking about
